dmca.title: [ABUSE] Re: Notification of Infringement - Primerica ref# 7.05.1.7
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, July 29, 2005 2:46 PM
To: legal@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Re: Notification of Infringement - Primerica ref#
7.05.1.7


--
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


Begin forwarded message:

> From: Lance Valenzuela <e5fxt@yahoo.com>
> Date: July 27, 2005 5:22:36 PM CDT
> To: abuse@theplanet.com, admins@theplanet.com
> Subject: [ABUSE] Re: Notification of Infringement - Primerica ref#
> 7.05.1.7
>
>
> I have complied with what you have requested. I am a
> Primerica agent in Fresno California also the
> webmaster and owner of the hosting company. I was not
> aware that I was not in compliance.
> Is there any printeed requirements for a web page for
> an agent?
> Could you please email them to me?
> Thanks,
> Lance Valenzuela
>
>
>
>
> --- Christine Lesiak <christine.lesiak@pfsfhq.com>
> wrote:
>
>
>> NOTIFICATION OF INFRINGEMENT
>>
>>
>> Dear Webmaster,
>>
>> I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that I am
>> the owner or am
>> authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the
>> intellectual property
>> rights. I have a good faith belief that the owner,
>> its agents or the law
>> has not authorized the use of the material
>> identified below. Please promptly
>> remove the infringing material and disable access to
>> it.
>>
>> Name of the Intellectual Property Owner:  Primerica
>> Financial Services,Inc.
>>
>> Name and/or Description of the Infringed Work or
>> Right: Trademark Primerica
>>
>> Description of the Infringing Material: Unapproved
>> Advertising
>>
>> Location of the Infringing Material:
>> http://www.aboutprimerica.com/
>>
>> Date: July 27, 2005
>>
>> I can be contacted at:
>>
>> Name: Christine Lesiak
>>
>> Title: Compliance Specialist, Office of the General
>> Counsel
>>
>> Company or Organization: Primerica Financial
>> Services, Inc.
>>
>> Street: 3120 Breckinridge Boulevard
>>
>> City: Duluth
>>
>> State: GA
>>
>> Zip: 30099-0001
>>
>> Telephone:  770.564.6107  Fax: 770.279.2752
>>
>> Email: christine.lesiak@pfsfhq.com
>>
>> I certify under penalty of perjury the truth of the
>> above information.
>> Signature:
>>
>> Christine Lesiak
>>
>>
>> P.S.We have attempted to contact the representative
>> who is responsible for
>> this ad but he does not respond.. The ad is not in
>> compliance with our
>> Trademark agreement. Please remove it from the
>> Internet.
>>
>>
>> The information contained in this e-mail address
>> (including any attachments)
>> is intended only for the personal and confidential
>> use of the recipient's)
>> named above.  This message may be an attorney-client
>> communication and/or
>> work product and privileged and confidential.  If
>> you are not the intended
>> recipient or responsible for delivering it to the
>> intended recipient, you
>> are hereby notified that you have received this
>> message in error, please
>> immediately notify us by e-mail, and delete the
>> original message.
>>
>>
>>
>>
>>
>
>
> __________________________________________________
> Do You Yahoo!?
> Tired of spam?  Yahoo! Mail has the best spam protection around
> http://mail.yahoo.com
>
>
